altTitle: 雷帝と呼ばれた最強冒険者、魔術学院に入学して一切の遠慮なく無双する
The World's Strongest S-Class Adventurer, Known as the Thunder Emperor, Shows His Power Without Restraint and Becomes a Warrior in the Magic Academy
title: Kaminari Tei to Yobareta Saikyou Boukensha, Majutsu Gakuin ni Nyuugakushite Issai no Enryonaku Musou suru
